Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp30.recnplay

Class Record

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp30.recnplay.Record
  • public class Record
extends java.lang.Object
    Record class stores all moves passed from the application class. converts them to JSON objects to be stored in an JSON array which is then saved as a JSON file, also adds the level as a JSON object
    Author:
    tamasedami

      Constructors

      constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String convertMoveToString​(Move a)
      converts the given move to the corresponding key/String
      void storeLevel​(java.lang.Integer levelNum)
      stores the level number, so correct level info can be loaded for replay
      void storePlayerMove​(Move move, int tick)
      called by chapsChallenge, saves the move which is converted to a string, includes the time remaining done this way to limit file size
      void writeJsonToFile()
      writes the Json array builder to a Json file first checks all existing files to makes sure it is not overwriting old files called when saving a game, or when choosing to watch a replay.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • storePlayerMove

        public void storePlayerMove​(Move move,
                            int tick)
        called by chapsChallenge, saves the move which is converted to a string, includes the time remaining done this way to limit file size
        Parameters:
        move - - Move functions used by application to move actors
        tick - - used in place of a time function to dictate when move occurred relative to game loop

      • storeLevel

        public void storeLevel​(java.lang.Integer levelNum)
        stores the level number, so correct level info can be loaded for replay
        Parameters:
        levelNum - -Integer dictating the level number

      • convertMoveToString

        public java.lang.String convertMoveToString​(Move a)
        converts the given move to the corresponding key/String
        Parameters:
        a - - a move function used by application
        Returns:
        move as a String represented by "WASD"

      • writeJsonToFile

        public void writeJsonToFile()
        writes the Json array builder to a Json file first checks all existing files to makes sure it is not overwriting old files called when saving a game, or when choosing to watch a replay.
